channel.description: Recent content in Iterative Closest Point on Fuwei's Tech Notes

item.title: LiDAR-SLAM Decoded: From Point Clouds to Precision Maps
item.description: An in-depth tutorial on Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM), covering its fundamental concepts, real-world applications, and key challenges.

item.title: Iterative Closest Point Uncovered: Mathematical Foundations and Applications
item.description: A detailed derivation of the Iterative Closest Point (ICP) problem.
